title: Xevioso
text:
Xevioso (alternately: Xewioso, Heviosso, <a href="Hevioso">Hevioso</a>) is a <a href="god">god</a> of <a href="thunder">thunder</a> of the <a href="Sao%20civilisation">So</a> region in <a href="Dahomey%20mythology">Dahomey mythology</a>. He is the twin brother of <a href="Gun%20%28mythology%29">Gun</a>, and is one of the children of <a href="Mawu">Mawu</a> and <a href="Lisa%20%28mythology%29">Lisa</a>.
References.
This divinity is also known as Jivodun (that is, <a href="Vodun">Vodun</a> of the sky)
